template.description: Users will receive this message for transaction approval.

contents.title: PingOne-transactieverzoek
contents.body: Keur deze transactie alstublieft goed.

contents.title: Solicitud de transacción de PingOne
contents.body: Aprueba esta transacción.

contents.title: PingOne Transaktionsanfrage
contents.body: Bitte genehmigen Sie diese Transaktion.

contents.subject: Demande de transaction PingOne
contents.body: Veuillez approuver cette transaction avec un code d'accès${otp}.

contents.title: คำขอธุรกรรม PingOne
contents.body: โปรดอนุมัติการทำธุรกรรมนี้

contents.subject: PingOne İşlem İsteği
contents.body: Lütfen bu işlemi ${otp} şifresiyle onaylayın.

contents.content: Hallo <pause1sec>, Ihr Autorisierungscode lautet <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ich wiederhole, Ihr Code lautet <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Olá <pause1sec> o seu código de autenticação é <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Repito, o seu código é <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Aprueba esta transacción con la contraseña ${otp}.
Подтвердите эту транзакцию с помощью секретного кода ${otp}
Approvare questa transazione con il passcode ${otp}.

contents.title: Pedido de transação do PingOne
contents.body: Aprove esta transação.

contents.content: Hallo <pause1sec>, uw authenticatiecode is <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ik herhaal, uw code is <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.title: PingOne 資訊交換請求
contents.body: 請同意此資訊交換。

contents.content: Bitte genehmigen Sie diese Transaktion mit dem Passcode ${otp}.
สวัสดี <pause1sec> รหัสยืนยันตัวตนของคุณคือ <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>ฉันขอย้ำ รหัสของคุณคือ <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
こんにちは <pause1sec>。あなたの認証コードは、 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec> です。繰り返します。あなたの認証コードは、 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue> です。

contents.subject: PingOne 거래 요청
contents.body: 비밀번호 ${otp}로 이 거래를 승인하세요.

contents.content: Здравствуйте, <pause1sec>! Ваш код аутентификации <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Повторяю, Ваш код: <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
비밀번호 ${otp}로 이 거래를 승인하세요.

contents.subject: PingOne 資訊交換請求
contents.body: 請以密碼 ${otp} 同意此資訊交換。

contents.title: PingOne トランザクション リクエスト
contents.body: トランザクションを承認してください

contents.content: 안녕하세요 <pause1sec> 귀하의 인증 코드는 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>입니다<pause1sec>다시 반복합니다. 귀하의 코드는 다음과 같습니다: <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Aprove esta transação com o código de acesso ${otp}.
您好，<pause1sec>您的身份驗證代碼是 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>。我重複，你的代碼是 <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Lütfen bu işlemi ${otp} şifresiyle onaylayın.
Bonjour <pause1sec>, votre code d'authentification est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Votre code est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>
Veuillez approuver cette transaction avec un code d'accès${otp}.

contents.subject: คำขอธุรกรรม PingOne
contents.body: โปรดอนุมัติธุรกรรมนี้ด้วยรหัสผ่าน ${otp}

contents.content: Veuillez approuver cette transaction avec le code d'accès ${otp}.

contents.subject: Demande de transaction PingOne
contents.body: Veuillez approuver cette transaction avec le code d'accès ${otp}.

contents.subject: Pedido de transação do PingOne
contents.body: Aprove esta transação com o código de acesso ${otp}.

contents.subject: PingOne-transactieverzoek
contents.body: Keur deze transactie alstublieft goed met de toegangscode ${otp}.

contents.content: Bonjour <pause1sec> votre code d'authentification est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Je répète, votre code est <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.subject: Запрос на транзакцию PingOne
contents.body: Подтвердите эту транзакцию с помощью секретного кода ${otp}.

contents.content: 請以密碼 ${otp} 同意此資訊交換。

contents.subject: Solicitud de transacción de PingOne
contents.body: Aprueba esta transacción con la contraseña ${otp}.

contents.title: Richiesta di transazione PingOne
contents.body: Approvare questa transazione.

contents.content: Merhaba <pause1sec> kimlik doğrulama kodunuz <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Kodunuzu tekrarlıyorum <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.title: PingOne İşlem İsteği
contents.body: Lütfen bu işlemi onaylayın.

contents.content: 以下のパスコードを入力し、このトランザクションを承認してください: ${otp}

contents.title: Demande de transaction PingOne
contents.body: Veuillez approuver cette transaction.

contents.title: Запрос на транзакцию PingOne
contents.body: Подтвердите эту транзакцию.

contents.title: PingOne 거래 요청
contents.body: 이 거래를 승인하십시오.

contents.content: Keur deze transactie alstublieft goed met de toegangscode ${otp}.

contents.subject: PingOne Transaktionsanfrage
contents.body: Bitte genehmigen Sie diese Transaktion mit dem Passcode ${otp}.

contents.subject: PingOne トランザクション リクエスト
contents.body: 以下のパスコードを入力し、このトランザクションを承認してください: ${otp}

contents.content: Hola, <pause1sec>, tu código de autenticación es <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>. Repito, tu código es <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

contents.subject: Richiesta di transazione PingOne
contents.body: Approvare questa transazione con il passcode ${otp}.

contents.title: Demande de transaction PingOne
contents.body: Veuillez approuver cette transaction.

contents.content: โปรดอนุมัติธุรกรรมนี้ด้วยรหัสผ่าน ${otp}
Ciao <pause1sec> il tuo codice di autenticazione è <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue><pause1sec>Ripeto il tuo codice è <sayCharValue>${OTP}</sayCharValue>

Hello <pause1sec> your authentication code is <sayCharValue>${otp}</sayCharValue><pause1sec><pause1sec><repeatMessage val=2>I repeat <pause1sec>your code is <sayCharValue>${otp}</sayCharValue></repeatMessage>

contents.title: PingOne Transaction Request
contents.body: Please approve this transaction.

contents.subject: PingOne Transaction Request
contents.body: Please approve this transaction with passcode ${otp}.

contents.content: Please approve this transaction with passcode ${otp}.
